content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. The location is prime, close to all important facilities like the supermarket and public transportation. Now, let's talk about the rental price. I'm looking for a price that truly reflects the value of my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you're looking for a price that reflects the value of your property, Mister Schmidt. I'm here to negotiate the best deal for both of us. How much are you hoping to rent the apartment for?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Well, Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm sure you can appreciate the prime location and the modern amenities of the apartment. I was thinking, let's say, 2000 Euro per month? I believe that's a fair price for such a desirable place.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 2000 Euro per month is a significant amount, Mister Schmidt. While I appreciate the quality of the apartment, I must consider my budget as a student. Is there any flexibility in your price?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: As a landlord, I understand your concern, but you must also understand that I have invested a lot of money into this property. I am willing to negotiate, but I must get a reasonable return on my investment. How about 1800 Euro per month? That's still a high price, but it's a concession I'm willing to make.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, Mister Schmidt. 1800 Euro per month is more within my budget as a student. However, I would like to discuss if there are any additional fees or if this price includes all utilities.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Let's make it clear, Yi-Nuo Wang. The 1800 Euro per month is for the rent of the apartment only. It does not include any utilities or additional fees. Those will be your responsibility. I hope that's clear.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Yes, Mister Schmidt, I understand that the 1800 Euro per month is for the rent only. I will be responsible for utilities and any additional fees. I appreciate your time and the offer. I will consider it and let you know my decision.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That sounds fair, Yi-Nuo Wang. I look forward to your decision. Remember, the apartment is a great investment for you, given its prime location and modern amenities. Let's hope we can find common ground.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I will take some time to think about it. If I have any questions or if there's anything else I should consider, may I contact you?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Of course, Yi-Nuo Wang. You may contact me if you have any further questions or concerns. I'm always available to assist you in making the best decision for your housing needs. I hope we can reach an agreement soon.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I'll be in touch.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: You're welcome, Yi-Nuo Wang. I look forward to your decision. Remember, time is of the essence. The apartment is in high demand, and I might have to consider other potential tenants if we can't reach an agreement soon.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you, Yi-Nuo Wang. I appreciate your understanding. Please let me know your decision at your earliest convenience. Good day.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Good day, Mister Schmidt. I will contact you soon.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
